      • hasGlobalBypassEnabled

        public static boolean hasGlobalBypassEnabled(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player currently has Global Chat Bypass enabled. (Sending all chat messages globally by default).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player currently has Global Chat Bypass enabled, else false.

      • hasGlobalChatSpyEnabled

        public static boolean hasGlobalChatSpyEnabled(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is currently spying on all chat (seeing chat for all worlds, ignoring sharing).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player is currently spying on chat, else false.

      • hasWorldChatSpyEnabled

        public static boolean hasWorldChatSpyEnabled(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the specified player has WorldChatSpy Enabled. Check PlayerChatManager#isSpyingOnWorld(Player player, String worldName) to see if they are spying on the particular world.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player currently has World Chat Spy enabled, else false.

      • isSpyingOnWorld

        public static boolean isSpyingOnWorld(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                      java.lang.String worldName)
        Checks if the specified player is currently spying on the specific world.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        worldName - The name of the world the chat message came from.
        Returns:
        True if the player is currently spying on that world, else false.

        Checks if the player has the specified word defined in their alerts.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        word - The alert word to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player has the word as an alert word, else false.

        Returns:

      • setChatMute

        public static void setChatMute(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
               boolean mute)
        Sets the player's chat mute status. If true, they will not see any chat messages. False if they should see chat messages.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who's chat mute setting is to be set.
        mute - True or False if should have chat muted.

      • setChatSpy

        public static void setChatSpy(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
              boolean spy)
        Sets the player's chat spy status. If true, the player will receive all chat messages, regardless of world share settings.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who's chat spy setting is to be set.
        spy - True or False if should have shat spy enabled.

      • setGlobalBypass

        public static void setGlobalBypass(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   boolean bypass)
        Sets the players Global Chat Bypass status. If true, the player's chat messages will be sent globally by default.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who's Global Chat Bypass setting is to be set.
        bypass - True or False if should have Global Chat Bypass enabled.

      • addAlertWord

        Adds the specified word to the specified player's alert list.
        Parameters:

        word - The word to add to the player's alert list.
